name: Create a Revolut draft payment from a new Trello card
description:
Use this template to automatically create a Revolut Business draft payment when a new Trello card is created.

The setup of the template assumes that the name of the recipient of the payment is used as a name for the Trello card and the amount to be sent is used as a description of the card. Additionally, your recipients' data have to be stored in an Airtable table. Your table has to include these fields: Name of the recipient (first name and last name) and payment details.

To see which details are required to create a Revolut draft payment depending on the country, click [here](https://developer.revolut.com/docs/build-banking-apps/#tutorials-tutorials-work-with-draft-payments-international-payments). For example, if you're creating a payment to the United Kingdom, your Airtable table needs to include an Account Number and a Sort Code; for payment to Germany, it's IBAN and BIC.
